definition: floccule/a wisp of material precipitated from liquid

sentences.english: These flocs then settle to the bottom and can be removed.
sentences.chinese: 然後這些絮狀物位於底部並可以被消除。

sentences.english: The floc formed has better sedimentation property, and easily be separated from water.
sentences.chinese: 並且產生的絮狀物沉降性能好，容易從水中分離出來。

sentences.english: Asked his urine, that is common in patients with white-floc.
sentences.chinese: 問其小便，患者說是常見白色絮狀物。
